body_html: The easiest solution is probably to update the grappler optimizers to ensure that the final output is generated in topological order. The one difficulty is going to figure out where to break looks to make TensorFlow happy. The natural place would be the NextIteration node.
body_text: The easiest solution is probably to update the grappler optimizers to ensure that the final output is generated in topological order. The one difficulty is going to figure out where to break looks to make TensorFlow happy.  The natural place would be the NextIteration node.
